text.wand.lessInfo: Add rectangles to the selected ship
text.wand.moreInfo1:
Right click for a rudder block to select the ship
Then right click on a block to select the first corner and right click to select the other corner and add to the ship.
text.wand.moreInfo2: Shift right click to delete selected corner (not from ship)
message.rectangleSet: Add %s and %s rectangle to the ship
message.wrongRectangle: Rectangle data can not convert to number
message.collisionWarning: ship shouldn't jump, because it can be cause a serious damage on target and himself
message.wrongRudderContext: ship does not match to the coordinates %s
